definitions.title: adj. f.
definitions.body: pregnant —; abs. ´[[ה]] Ge 16:11 + 10 t.; cstr. [[הֲרַת]] Je 20:17; pl. cstr. [[הָרוֹת]] Am 1:13; sf. [[הָרוֹתֶיהָ]] 2Ki 15:16; [[הָרׂתֵיהֶם]] 2Ki 8:12; —pregnant, as attrib., ´[[אִשָּׁה ה]] Ex 21:22; as pred. Ge 38:24 ([[לִזְנוּנִים]]), v:Ge 38:25 ([[לְאִישׁ]]), 1Sa 4:19, 2Sa 11:5, Is 7:14 (+ [[וְיׁלֶדֶת]]); in phr. [[הִנׇּח הָדָה וְיׁלַדְתְּ]] Ge 16:11 (on resemblance to Is 7:14 cf. Peters:Hbr. Apr. 1885, 243; Apr. 1886, 175), Ju Jdg 13:5, Jdg 13:7; = subst. pregnant women, women with child Am 1:13, 2Ki 8:12, 2Ki 15:16, Je 31:8, and, in sim., Is 26:17; once of womb [[וְרַחְמָהּ]] [[הֲרַת עוֹלָם]] Je 20:17.
